mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, BRDIMG FROM BOARD WHERE BRDNO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDCONTENT,bBRDIMG, BRDID, BRDHIT, BRDDATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{brdtitle}, #{brdcontent}, #{brdimg, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{brdid}, #{brdhit}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDID, BRDHIT, BRDDATE ROWNUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BRDNO DESC) ROWN FROM BOARD WHERE BRDTITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%') WHERE ROWN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRDTITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BRDHIT = BRDHIT + 1 WHERE BRDNO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(BRDNO),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BRDNO < #{brdno}
SELECT NVL(MIN(BRDNO),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BRDNO > #{brdno}
